text: niccayamāka allāh vāṉaṅkaḷil uḷḷavaṟṟaiyum, pūmiyil uḷḷavaṟṟaiyum, uṅkaḷukku vacappaṭutti irukkiṟāṉ eṉpataiyum; iṉṉum taṉ aruṭ koṭaikaḷai uṅkaḷ mītu puṟattilum, akattilum nirampac ceytirukkiṟāṉ eṉpataiyum nīṅkaḷ aṟiyavillaiyā? Āyiṉum, makkaḷil cilar irukkiṟārkaḷ; avarkaḷ pōtiya kalviyaṟivillāmalum; nērvaḻi illāmalum, oḷimikka vētamillāmalum allāhvaik kuṟittut tarkkam ceykiṉṟaṉar
